snippet.title: Cassette Beasts Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Follow and Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1321440/Cassette_Beasts/

Collect awesome monsters to use during turn-based battles in this open-world RPG. Combine any two monster forms using Cassette Beasts’ Fusion System to create unique and powerful new ones!

Made by Bytten Studio and Published by Raw Fury, Cassette Beasts will release on Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, Game Pass, PC and Switch.
